review_title: Very exciting team and work environment
job_title: Vice President Technology in Montreal, QC
pros: Very energetic team, always new and exciting projects and always pushing to get better and better at what we do.
cons: This could be "con" for some people and a "pro" for others. You really need to be on top of your game every day.

review_title: It is a very nice family office to work in.
pros: The people who work there and the family who owns it are wonderful caring people
cons: The current President does not fit with the family ideas.  She does not realize that people have lives and she is very cold hearted.

pros: Great location, some great people, reasonable pay
cons: The founders don't really know where they are going or how to get there.
